Regional Offices

Canada

The Safeway Canada Division operates within three major areas throughout Canada with Division offices in Calgary, Winnipeg, and Vancouver. Safeway operates in Western Canada, from Vancouver Island to Thunder Bay Ontario, as well as in the provinces of British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba and Northwestern Ontario.

Denver

The Safeway Denver Division offices are located in Centennial, CO and operating within five states including Colorado, Wyoming, northern New Mexico, western Nebraska, and south-western South Dakota. The Denver Division stretches from Farmington, New Mexico to Casper, Wyoming and from Burlington, Colorado west to Grand Junction.

Dominick’s (Chicago Land Area)

The Safeway Dominick’s Division offices are located in Oak Brook, IL operating throughout the Chicagoland Area and it’s surrounding suburbs. The Dominickâ€™s Division stretches west to Oswego, north to Gurnee, and south to Matteson. Dominick’s operates a number of stores in the city of Chicago as well.

Eastern

The Safeway Eastern Division offices are located in Lanham, MD and operates Safeway in Maryland, Virginia, Washington, DC, Delaware, and Genuardis in Pennsylvania and New Jersey. The Eastern Division operates as far south as Culpeper, Virginia, North to Westminster, Maryland, and East to our newest location in Rehoboth Beach, Delaware.

Northern California

The Safeway NorCal Division offices are located in Pleasanton, CA operating within Northern California to the Oregon border, Western Nevada, and Hawaii. The NorCal Division stretches from King City, south of Monterey, north to Crescent City and West into Lovelock, Nevada. NorCal operates stores on the Islands of Kauai, Oahu, Maui, and the Island of Hawaii.

Phoenix

The Safeway Phoenix Division offices are located in Tempe, AZ. The division spans across the state of Arizona and east to Gallup, New Mexico.

Portland

The Safeway Portland Division offices are located in Clackamas, Oregon. The Division covers all of Oregon and Southwest Washington.

Texas (Randall’s/Tom Thumb)

The Safeway Texas Division office is located in Houston and supports three major markets. In Austin and Houston, Safeway operates Randall’s stores and in the Dallas/Fort Worth area Safeway operates Tom Thumb stores.

Seattle

The Safeway Seattle Division Office is located in Bellevue, WA. The Division is comprised of the Northwestern states of Washington, Idaho, Montana & Alaska that are very diverse in their geography and offer limitless beauty. In Alaska, Safeway operates both Safeway & Carrs stores.

Vons (Southern California)

The Safeway Vons Division offices are located in Arcadia, CA and operate both Vons and Pavillions stores throughout Southern CA, California’s Central Coast, and Southern Neveda.
